channel.title: Kicksecure on Mint Debian Edition 4

My main question: Is it possible to install Kicksecure on top of Linux Mint Debian edition which would be the host OS of my first workstation directly hardwired to my ipFire workstation. What‚Äôs your idea on this will kicksecure install on mint Debbie ?

item.title: Kicksecure on Mint Debian Edition 4
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Perrosompopo:

What‚Äôs your idea on this will kicksecure install on mint Debbie ?

Are you morphing the mint distro or merely running VMs on top? VMs should enable you to run very different OSs regardless of the host.

Read full topic

item.title: Kicksecure on Mint Debian Edition 4
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Welcome to Whonix forums and thank you for your question!

Welcome to forums generally. Different forums have different styles. There are rich sources of knowledge.

Mint is untested at time of writing.

Whonix ‚Äì 18 Apr 21

Unsupported

This feature is either undocumented, untested, or unsupported. Options: Become a Contributor / Apply Free Support Principle / Purchase Professional Support.

Only Debian buster is tested.
